name: Add item to the bag, using search and quick shop, which price is bigger than 75$, check that items name and price from search and bag are identical and check status of shipping progress bar

steps.name: open home page
Close cookie consent banner if visible
Go to 'Search' section, find some items and close adverts, if appears
click on 'Search' button
wait until 'Search' modal becomes visible
wait until 'Search' field becomes clickable
type text into the 'Search' field
click 'Submit' loupe-like button
check if there is a modal layer with shadow root and close it
wait for url
choose to sort items from the most expensive to less one and pick first item
click on filter 'Sort' inside search result page
click on radio 'Price: High to Low' inside search result page
scroll to first item that was found via search
Get item info from 'Quick shop' modals
get item's name that was found via search for adding to bag
get item's sale price that was found via search for adding to bag
get item's regular price that was found via search for adding to bag
move to 'Quick Shop' button, wait for it and click
check that 'Quick Shop' modal is visible
get text of modal's title
pick size, add item to bag inside 'Quick Shop' modal, go to cart and wait for it's url
scroll to 'Size' button and click on it
click on first size option inside 'Size' dropdown
click on 'Add to Bag' button inside 'Quick Shop' modal
check that 'Added to Bag' modal is visible
click on 'View Bag' button
wait for url
wait for spinner to disappear
Get item info from Cart page shortly (only name and prices)
get added to cart item's sale price
get added to cart item's name
get added to cart item's sale price
get added to cart item's regular price
get text of shipping message
get shipping progress bar status
get sub total value

items.statusDetails:

expected: "Free shipping unlocked — make the most of it!"
